name: ughioma
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   { #dashboard_index, #dashboard_inbox, #dashboard_edit_post, #dashboard_submissions, #dashboard_drafts, #dashboard_post_queue, #dashboard_likes, #dashboard_followers, #dashboard_following, #dashboard_directory, #dashboard_lookup_contacts, #main_doc_page, #dashboard_settings, #dashboard_create_tumblelog, #dashboard_members, #main_tag, #main_meetups, #main_about, #main_explore, #dashboard_goodies, #main_developers, #main_themes, #dashboard_manage_themes, #main_edit_theme, #main_jobs, #main_policy, #dashboard_tumblelog_settings { background:#000 url(http://i.imgur.com/CpDJl.jpg) no-repeat fixed center top !important } #dashboard_index div.l-content, #dashboard_inbox div.l-content, #dashboard_submissions div.l-content, #dashboard_drafts div.l-content, #dashboard_post_queue div.l-content, #dashboard_likes div.l-content, #dashboard_followers div.l-content, #dashboard_members div.l-content, #main_tag div.l-content, #dashboard_tumblelog_settings #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;}

div.l-content.l-content.l-content { background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important } .selection_nipple { border-bottom-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important } .permalink { background: none !important } .avatar_frame { background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important; border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important } .notification { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; border: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important; background-image: none !important; margin-bottom: 1px !important } .notification a { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important } .notification a:hover { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important } .notification_type_icon { display: none !important } .nipple { border-right-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.07) !important } .controls_section li { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important } .with_subtitle small { color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important } .recessed a { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important } .radar { display: none !important } * { text-shadow: none !important } h1, .title { color: rgba(0,0,0,0.6) !important } .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important } .dashboard_options_form { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; border: none !important; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important } .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer, .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer a { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important } .blue_note, .blue_note a { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.6) !important } #footer, #footer a { border: none !important; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important } img[src*="http://static.tumblr.com/duegx7i/oKGm04vmm/000.png"] { opacity: 0; visibility: hidden } .new_post { background: #fff url(http://static.tumblr.com/duegx7i/oKGm04vmm/000.png) no-repeat center bottom } .new_post_label { -webkit-text-stroke:0 !important; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4) !important; opacity:1 !important; top: 0px !important; padding-top: 80px } .new_post_label:hover { color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important } #pagination a { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.4) !important; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important } #pagination a:hover { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important } #dashboard_controls a, #dashboard_controls .control { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important } .dashboard_controls_arrow_first_page, .dashboard_controls_arrow_left, .dashboard_controls_arrow_right { display: none !important } }
